entry.title: Schlosspark Türnich (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Schlosspark Türnich, the park of a moated palace (pictured), is managed with a focus on biodiversity?

entry.title: Bull Island (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Bull Island was farmed by the Money family for over 100 years before being turned into a wildlife preserve?

entry.title: Mukundrao Pai (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Indian cricketer Mukundrao Pai's altercation with a British army major, J. G. Greig, resulted in the Bombay Quadrangular introducing neutral umpires in 1916?

entry.title: Hey Mama (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Kanye West recorded "Hey Mama" five years before its release on his 2005 album Late Registration?

entry.title: MicroMacro: Crime City (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that the game MicroMacro: Crime City was so popular after its release that print runs repeatedly sold out for eight months?

entry.title: Zhuo Qun Song (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Chinese-Canadian Zhuo Qun Song is currently the most decorated International Mathematical Olympiad contestant?

entry.title: Bidar Alam (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that the village of Bidar Alam was the seat of the Indonesian government for three and a half months?

entry.title: Global Methodist Church (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that the Global Methodist Church is part of a proposed divorce over marriage?
